医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究警告 α-H1N2 猪流感病毒存在潜在的大流行风险猪体内的 α-H1N2 流感病毒由于能够逃避人类免疫并在物种之间传播，因此具有较高的大流行风险，这凸显了警惕监测的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/New-study-warns-of-pottial-pandemic-risk-from-ceb1-H1N2-swine-flu-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/New-study-warns-of-pottial-pandemic-risk-from-ceb1-H1N2-swine-flu-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a04c2267-4e17-4ea3-94e5-8a1c5203bac9 Sun, 23 Jun 2024 22:15:00 -0400 New study warns of potential pandemic risk from α-H1N2 swine flu virus
产前使用大麻如何影响新生儿结局？产前吸食大麻会显着增加低出生体重和胎儿死亡的风险，这凸显了需要对其在怀孕期间的危险进行更多的教育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/How-does-prenatal-cannabis-use-affect-neonatal-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/How-does-prenatal-cannabis-use-affect-neonatal-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e69a21c-983c-4ba6-83a5-afcc75cc91eb Sun, 23 Jun 2024 21:55:00 -0400 How does prenatal cannabis use affect neonatal outcomes?
绝经前切除卵巢可能加速大脑退化绝经前双侧卵巢切除术 (PBO) 与大脑白质完整性降低有关，尤其是在 40 岁之前接受 PBO 的女性，这表明潜在的长期认知影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/Ovary-removal-before-menopause-could-accelerate-brain-degenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/Ovary-removal-before-menopause-could-accelerate-brain-degenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ddbab00-369d-4d1a-bd25-5d9c986e3ec4 Sun, 23 Jun 2024 21:45:00 -0400 Ovary removal before menopause could accelerate brain degeneration
维生素 D 缓解腕管综合症症状研究调查了维生素 D 补充剂对维生素 D 水平低的腕管综合征 (CTS) 患者的影响，发现在皮质类固醇治疗的基础上添加维生素 D 可以改善疼痛缓解和症状严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/Vitamin-D-for-carpal-tunnel-syndrome-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/Vitamin-D-for-carpal-tunnel-syndrome-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f628ca5-55e4-498c-b39f-ce0b12f6e4f0 Sun, 23 Jun 2024 20:21:00 -0400 Vitamin D for carpal tunnel syndrome symptoms
默克基金会宣布 2023 年非洲媒体表彰奖获奖者，以表彰其在健康报道方面的卓越表现德国默克集团的慈善机构默克基金会 (www.Merck-Foundation.com) 宣布了默克基金会非洲媒体认可 2023 年“不仅仅是母亲”奖和 2023 年肯尼亚“糖尿病和高血压”奖的获奖者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Merck-Foundation-announces-2023-Africa-Media-Recognition-Award-winners-for-excellence-in-health-reporting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Merck-Foundation-announces-2023-Africa-Media-Recognition-Award-winners-for-excellence-in-health-reporting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6bd369e-5da6-408a-a034-1cde7a20f40e Sat, 22 Jun 2024 02:53:00 -0400 Merck Foundation announces 2023 Africa Media Recognition Award winners for excellence in health reporting
诺和诺德在 2024 年 ADA 科学会议上展示索马鲁肽试验的主要发现诺和诺德今天宣布在即将举行的美国糖尿病协会 (ADA) 第 84 届科学会议上展示 34 份摘要，凸显其产品组合的广度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Novo-Nordisk-presents-key-findings-from-semaglutide-Trials-at-ADA-scientific-sessions-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Novo-Nordisk-presents-key-findings-from-semaglutide-Trials-at-ADA-scientific-sessions-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1788765f-be6e-4785-82d0-6ced18bc4b0d Sat, 22 Jun 2024 02:45:00 -0400 Novo Nordisk presents key findings from semaglutide trials at ADA scientific sessions 2024
帮助夏季保持足部健康并预防脚气的小贴士随着天气变暖，我们进入夏天，我们中的许多人似乎突然想起我们腿末端的肢体也需要一些爱和照顾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Tips-to-help-keep-feet-healthy-during-summer-and-prevent-athletee28099s-foot.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Tips-to-help-keep-feet-healthy-during-summer-and-prevent-athletee28099s-foot.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=621f1d2b-5c15-43f9-b533-eebd7c7da819 Sat, 22 Jun 2024 02:35:00 -0400 Tips to help keep feet healthy during summer and prevent athlete’s foot
研究表明牛皮癣患者的关节炎症状负担很重一项检查牛皮癣患者患关节炎风险的国际研究的早期结果显示，712 名患者的关节症状负担很重，占迄今为止研究总数的 25%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Study-shows-high-burden-of-arthritis-symptoms-in-病人-people-with-psoriasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Study-shows-high-burden-of-arthritis-symptoms-in-病人-people-with-psoriasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=599b886f-b087-46aa-9200-cebbde90803f Sat, 22 Jun 2024 02:27:00 -0400 Study shows high burden of arthritis symptoms in patients people with psoriasis
A 型血友病治疗取得突破：Sobi 的 ALTUVOCT 获得欧盟营销授权Sobi® 今天宣布，欧盟委员会已授予 ALTUVOCT™ (efanesoctocog alfa) 营销授权，用于治疗和预防 A 型血友病的出血和围手术期预防。ALTUVOCT 是一种高持续因子 VIII 替代疗法，适用于所有年龄段和任何疾病严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Breakthrough-in-hemophilia-A-treatment-Sobis-ALTUVOCT-receives-EU-marketing-authorization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Breakthrough-in-hemophilia-A-treatment-Sobis-ALTUVOCT-receives-EU-marketing-authorization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a20e316f-ba01-4256-b861-b44fc78c4815 Sat, 22 Jun 2024 02:24:00 -0400 Breakthrough in hemophilia A treatment: Sobi's ALTUVOCT receives EU marketing authorization
无论遗传因素如何，营养饮食都可以预防 2 型糖尿病东芬兰大学的一项新研究表明，遵循营养建议的健康饮食与更好的血糖水平以及较低的前驱糖尿病和 2 型糖尿病风险相关。在具有 2 型糖尿病高遗传倾向的个体中也观察到了这种关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Nutritious-diet-may-protect-against-type-2-diabetes-regardless-of-genics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240622/Nutritious-diet-may-protect-against-type-2-diabetes-regardless-of-genics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d193e5f-619d-45dc-b4e6-ac03de167556 Sat, 22 Jun 2024 02:20:00 -0400 Nutritious diet may protect against type 2 diabetes, regardless of genetics
